entry.title: Thursday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the morning. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 08:43 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
